185436540.review:
新手异常折磨，很多设计也很反人类。
折磨：1，新手怎么知道S和👇键是丢出金币？也不给个按键说明，这个玩意好像费不了你多少时间吧？嗯？
2，我玩到现在，我也才勉勉强强能感受到，有些时候的夜晚，是没怪的，但我不知道，所以就给工人布置了少量的任务，这很亏，夜晚时间加个标题，明示一下有无怪生成，很难吗？很复杂吗？或者做个什么标志提醒一下阿，很难吗？比方做个什么图标，发光就是今晚有怪，暗淡就是无，很难吗？嗯？3，你既然开头做了一个类似灵魂的指引主角前往废弃的营地，那在遇到刷挂门的时候，你就不能让那个灵魂现身一下吗？不然新手谁知道这乌漆嘛黑的大门，是刷怪的东西？嗯？还有，怎么推你又不说。直到我后期一直在升营地，突然发现可以买骑士，是用骑士去推进，你嘴哑了？不会说？反人类设计：1，这个游戏里面，砍树的机制，我还没弄明白，但几乎都有一个通性，砍树，必须环境一半是光明的（并非白天的意思，只要树林不茂密，就行，换个说法，从俩端开始砍，不能从中间开始砍，除非中间这部分，断开的很大，足以让差不多一个屏的距离的环境，变成白天。）就这个玩意，我刚推完一个刷怪门，手滑按了旁边的一棵树，但这个位置，已经离我的营地很远了，但是我的边界，也并不长，所以我每造出一个工人，本来是修船的，修墙的，好家伙，全都急着去砍我刚刚失误点出来的那棵树，一个接一个的送死去。你说闹不闹心？这不折磨？2，和第一个问题差不多，我真的强烈建议！！！！！！！！！强烈建议，标记过的地方，可以取消，已经造好的东西，可以拆除，强烈建议！！！！！！！！！！！一个，是我刚刚说的，树的情况，另一个，我记得我有一个档，是二图的，左边是老巢，以及一个刷怪门，右边一个刷怪门，和码头，所以目标很明确了，右边作为大后方，发展经济，但是养农民，周期太长了，我也不想养，我的规划是，营地以右的，树全砍了，就是打兔子，因为我那个时候的弓手相当多，也是为了应付敌怪，你想想，弓手多，生成兔子的草地，又是从营地，一直到最右边的码头，能不赚钱吗？而且你养农民，我记得也得有那个像水沟一样的东西吧？这玩意也不一定密集到能一块地方都不浪费吧？说回正题，我砍完了树，就准备全打兔子的，结果，手滑了，我造了一个墙，对！！！！！！最右边的那个位置！！！！！就是手滑！！！！！！！！！！然后，老子的兔子，一个没得了，就离谱，这多耽误事阿？不是吗？再一个，本来就不合理阿，兔子这个东西。在树林里面，没有吧？是因为啥？没草地对吧？那我已经把树清理了，只是把墙建在了最右的地方，但是我还没做农田阿，这。，你凭什么给我兔子移除了？是不是领土内就不能生成了？这不是更不要脸了吗？不知道皇家牧场这个概念吗？3，最反人类，最傻x的一个设计，老子建成最高级的营地，你凭什么强制建造一个箭塔，把我弓手扣在那，嗯？说你傻吧，你还知道皇家边界要有守卫军，说你聪明吧，你居然做出了，领土内不可生成兔子这种操作，4，更傻x的设计，我接着我那个图2，来举例，我最右边，我说了吧？有码头，和一个刷怪门，我就做了一个骑士，他领着他的四个小跟班，就去打了。到这我也觉得没啥，问题是，这个档，我打了十多天，这队人马，除了拔了那个门以外，就任何作用都没有了，但是他却占着五个人。一个骑士，4个弓手，有病是不是？啥用都没有，就是摆设，甚至左边的，屎都要被打出来了，也不见他们去支援，你是不是脑残？你是想做皇家守卫这种效果是吧？那他们最多也就是不能去打野阿，巡逻不行吗？不会吗？5，有史以来，你做的最傻x的一个东西，你那个投石机，贵，我也就不说了，攻速慢，我也不说了，还得俩工人操作才能达到最大的使用速度，我也不说你什么了，这玩意的准度，嗯？你认真的？？？？？？？墙正下面的，一个都打不到，怪又跑的贼鸡巴快，这石头只有极少数时候才让我觉得他值这么多。骑士那个，我就建议，你想打哪边，你就造哪边的人，然后，注意，接下来的话才是重点-----你要么，就造个骑士，让全部的弓手都跟随，左边的，右边的，都来跟着骑士，去攻打，推进，如果你非要保留，一个骑士，就是要带上4个弓手，也行的。不过，打完了，把这4个弓手，还给玩家，变成普通的弓手。最后，你真的应该好好的去做一下人物的交互，很多时候，莫名其妙的，弓手根本控制不了，比方，你右边已经打通了，你造了一堆弓手，你想让他们去左边帮忙，可是这些人工智障，全跑去右边了，气不气人？要么，你就给每一个人物和主角做交互，令主角可以单独的命令每一个弓手，工人，甚至是骑士，这能解决很多问题。最后，强烈上书：造的东西可以拆，标记的东西可以取消！！！！！！造的东西可以拆，标记的东西可以取消！！！！！！造的东西可以拆，标记的东西可以取消！！！！！！

185426714.review:
Siendo muy sincero, es un juego bastante injusto, sin referencias, mal cuidado, con mucha frustración. Puede que con mucho tiempo logres entender la metodología y poder cumplir con varios objetivos, pero sigue siendo demasiado excesivo para lo que podría ser. Con algunas ventajas como las hay en Kingdom Two Crows sería perfecto.
Es un juego que me encanta, su estilo visual y además su jugabilidad, pero resulta demasiado injusto. 
No te digo que no te lo compres, pero si podes, preferiblemente comprá el Two Crows, la pasarás mejor y si tenes suerte con amigos.

185367446.review: this game made me brake 2 mouses and 1 keyboard

185361298.review: Jogo massa, versão paga do Kingdom classic, tráz uma diversidade maior na gameplay, com novas montarias, melhorias de torre e clima. Recomendo fortemente jogar Kingdom classic antes desse, pois a gameplay, apesar de diversificada, não muda nada de um jogo pro outro (esquerda,direita,esmola), então, se você tem a opção de jogar o mesmo jogo, entre pago e gratuito, vai de free e gasta um tempo.

185340855.review:
"A horse? Give me an asthmatic one."

Une direction artistique prompte à recommencer, sans cesse : aucune destruction possible (merci les murs et les fermes), replacement des villageois et des troupes à proscrire, qui se placent selon leur bon vouloir qu'importe la pertinence (chevalier en armure et archers protégeant un flan gagné et autres), un cheval asthmatique (sérieusement, 30 secondes ?), des mécaniques cryptiques qui poussent à se tromper (merci l'hiver et l'herbe), impossibilité de redémarrer d'une île autre que la première (jamais vu pire "die and retry"), aucun contexte (l'idée de fuir une île dont on a la maîtrise) ; un bateau qui en chie long sur la berge (des jours à attendre). Une difficulté dont seul vous êtes le responsable.
En bref, une durée de vie donc comme une plaie béante, artificielle. Et qu'importe le pixel art - ça ne fait pas tout.

185330418.review: A very difficult game, without many instructions which challenges you. You can only move right and left, need to think of time always. Planning is key in order to keep the foes at bay.

185141926.review: jogo viciante mas as vezes da um ódio desse cavalo asmático

185068563.review: Kingdom: New Lands offers a beautifully minimalist strategy experience. You play as a monarch, tasked with building your kingdom while defending it from mysterious creatures. The game’s simple yet deep mechanics make it easy to pick up, but challenging to master. The balance of resource management, exploration, and defense creates a compelling experience, and the art style is wonderfully unique. It’s perfect for those who enjoy strategic games with a peaceful, yet tense atmosphere.

185039288.review:
миленькая минималистическая игра, простое управление, простой гемплей...
но какого здесь нет сейвов? (в стратегиях оффлайн должны быть сейвы, это не шутер)
почему я не могу перезапустить игру, а не начинать сначала? 
почему я не вижу солнца в лесу (а значит время выпуска орды тоже)?
почему в рандоме бывает так, что лагерь бомжей за порталом, а не перед?
почему нет миникарты?

не рекомендую тем у кого нервы - это ценный ресурс!

184986176.review: 还行 就是没人和我玩

184973545.review:
После первой части плохо. Все, что вы можете делать в этой игре, это тратить монеты. Но в этой части слишком просто попасть в ситуацию, когда денег нет.

Например, у меня не было огородников, но уже были рыцари. Моя экономика строилась на лучниках, которых не осталось после появления рыцарей. Рыцари забрали всех лучников себе, а подопечные рыцарей не охотятся. В итоге мне пришлось специально делать дыры в обороне (поставил слабую стену), чтобы убить рыцарей и тем самым освободить лучников из плена. Все умерли, кроме рыцаря, он бежал впереди всех.

А зима здесь зачем?! Поля не дают монеток, диких животных нет, в итоге денег тоже. Сидишь 20 минут, смотришь видео, пока игра сама с собой играет

184920705.review: The game feels overly slow and punishing. After making significant progress, a minor mistake can cause you to lose everything in an instant. Additionally, there are limited interactive mechanics, as most actions happen automatically, leaving your colony to operate independently without much player input.

184808801.review: Divertido y adictivo, con su simple mecánica de estrategia que hereda del anterior y primer juego de la franquicia, vamos, un 'construir ciudades' muy atípico y original ... no es fácil ni mucho menos de llegar a dominar y es básicamente el mismo primer juego, con el agregado de mucho contenido, entre nuevos npcs, monturas, estructuras y una nueva dinámica que te permite cambiar entre escenarios (cada vez más difíciles) una vez que se completan, y sumar a esto que hay logros que hacen más divertido aún esto, agregando tiempos límites para hacerlo. Recomendadísimo!

184685368.review: Cool art ,okay idea but gets boring quick ,same as previous one not much as changed ,still lame

184660170.review:
Pago l'anima di un uomo con una moneta: diventa un soldato.
Il soldato perde la moneta e torna perso: ripago il soldato e le sue armi.
Il saldato diventa un fabbro.
Il fabbro spinge la nave: il fabbro muore.
Un ex soldato diventa fabbro e prende il suo posto: muore.
Pago 4 monete per avere una scorta: la nave arriva.
Cerco un fabbro da proteggere e far arrivare in sicurezza sulla nave: sono tutti soldati e argicoltori. 10/10

184643034.review:
I played the first one a few years ago and loved it, so when I saw a promotion I picked up the others in the series. It's a shame this one doesn't have the same quality of game design.

Instead of a randomised map we have a system of progression through islands, except that the last island is stupidly unbalanced and relies heavily on RNG, which totally ruins the fun of the game. More than half the time it took me to finish the game was on this island, because of the artificial and pointless difficulty, unlike the previous ones and the first game.

184577155.review: Lovely game! The artstyle is endearing, the music is beautiful, and the gameplay-loop is simple and effective. Definitely an improvement over Kingdom: Classic. If you're looking for a game with a lot of varying content however, this game may not be for you. It shines in it's rogue-like repetition of the core gameplay loop.

184571141.review: Relativ minimalistisches aber schwieriges "Rogue-like/Aufbau/Ressourcen-Management-Spiel", das mich überraschend süchtig gemacht hat, bis ich alle Inseln erfolgreich verlassen konnte.

184453040.review:
Im going to have to give this one a pass. It has a charming introduction and a very easy to understand tutorial that introduces the limited mechanics. The issue lies in those limited mechanics. In no way shape or form are you actually allowed to control and order/place your growing populous to increase your protective capability. For example. Everything is done on a 2D plain and enemies will assault, or have assaulted me from a single direction. You can unlock the capability to build some great defensive weaponry, but if you built a defensive wall on both sides of your kingdom there is a chance your catapult will place itself on the side of your kingdom that never is under assault. If you produce archers meant to defend your walls, they will split into two groups, one that never defends anything and just hangs out on the safe side of the kingdom, and the other that will actually defend your walls. You can build a boat that will house upwards to 4 archers and will assault your enemies outside your walls, but it will float around and carry itself outside of any defensive position and be rendered useless. There is also the many archers to take roost on the ship, you have to prove each of them and their service on the ship is automatic. So if you have 8 archers defending a vital position and that empty boat floats by, there's a chance you are about to lose 4 archers, and there's nothing you can do about it.  This goes for everything in the game, it's all automatic and all you can do is build. You may send your engineers to go build a wall, but it's too late and you would want them to recreate from that order...Well, there's nothing you can do to stop them and they will continue forward into the danger zone and die. This game is so close to being good, but it offers so little control for the player that it's own automatic systems often set the player up for a loss, and add in obstacles into the mix one should not have to deal with. 

Now, above all that. Another and much more pressing reason one should not buy this game is. When I launched this game on my mac, I was asked to give permissions for the game to record all my keystrokes on any program I use. They wanted to spy on me and copy every password I enter, every email I type, and every message I send via text on my computer...

184094968.review:
Öncellikle neden tavsiye etmediğimi açıklamadan önce şunu belirtmem gerekiyor. Aslında ben bu oyunu 3 saat oynadım.Geri kalan 18 saati benim bilgisayarım oynadı. 3 saat oynadıktan sonra 5. denememde tam gemiyi tamir ediyordum ki  tacımı şu küçük yeşiller tarafından kaybettim. Ancak birdenbire taç ortadan kayboldu ve kendimi böyle bir ortamda buldum.
                        
                                  
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3395007870 
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3395007143    

Bu durumu kullanıp 100. seviyeye kadar ilerlemeyi denedim. Ancak bilgisayarımın kasmasından dolayı halen daha tam bitirmiş değilim.Bu durum ne kadar normal bilmiyorum ama ücretsiz bir oyun olan Kingdom:Classic oyununda bug olmayıp ücretli bir oyunda  3 saat içerisinde böyle bir bug bulundurması bence büyük bir başarı . Yapımcıları tebrik ediyorum.

Tavsiye etememin sebebi ise oyunun tavsiye edilecek hiçbir yanı olmaması.Serinin ücretsiz  oyunuyla bu oyunun farkları şu:
-Artık tamir etmemiz gereken bir gemi var .Geminin var olması oyundaki amacın sur ve kule eklemekten ibaret olmaması anlamına geliyor.İlk oyun strateji oyunu değildi.Bu oyunla birlikte yine yaptıklarımızın sınırlı ve çok tekrarlanmasından dolayı kötü bir strateji oyunu oluyor.
-Ücretsiz oyunuyla kıyasla toplanabilecek insan sayısı az . Bu yüzden oyun size gemi yaptırmaya zorluyor. Yerimde kalıyım savunıyım diyorsanız belki birkaç gemi tamir ettirdikten sonra olabilir.(O kadar ilerlemedim o yüzden emin değilim.)
-Artık bölgenin köşelerinde bulunan taş alanlardan düşman çıkabiliyor.(Bu durum hiçbir şeyi değiştirmiyor. Bize geldikleri yol aynı zaten.)

Bunu  haricinde tema aynı,ana karakter aynı,yapay zeka aynı,kuleler aynı,asker türlerinde hiçbir değişiklik yok ve yine savunmak için okçu, mancınık spamlamak daha iyi yol.Bir yazıyı değiştirmeye bile tenezzül etmemişler.Hadi bunları es geçelim. Normalde aynı oyunlara karşı bu kadar eleştirmem . Bir oyun güzel yapılmışsa ve beni eğlendiriyorsa isterse yeni serisi çıksın aynı olsun umrumda değil severek oynarım. (Örnk:Ac üçlemesi,Bioshock 1,2).Ama bu oyunda yaptığınız şey şu:
-Merkezini kur.
-Olabildince ağaç kes altın topla.Fazlada genişleme.
-Okçu,sur,kule ve  mancınık spamla.
-Baktın seni yokedecekler bütün altınlarını gemi tamirine ver.
-Başka adaya git.
-Bu işlemi bilmem kaç kez tekrar et.
Kingdom:Classic oyununun önceden ücretli ,daha sonradan ücretsiz  olduğunu biliyorum. Neredeyse farklı olmayan bir oyunun ücretli olması gerektiği anlamına gelmiyor.
Genellikle yorum yazarken fiyat hakkında konuşmam  ama bu oyunda aşırı göze battı.Bir oyunu oynarken dolandırılmış hissettim. 
1/10

184034609.review: Loved the other Kingdom games, but losing the crown meaning more or less to fully start over is just a huge waste time. Previously you could revisit the islands as new king and rebuild, but here you get a new island and start with next to no ressources fresh. Played once to island 3, died unnecessary because unaware of the consequences and that was the New Lands experience for me...

183903046.review:
전작인 클래식의 단조로움을 특수한 기능을 가진 몇몇 탈것의 추가와 배를 통한 섬의 이동을 통해 많이 해소했습니다.
따라서 전작과는 달리 미니멀리스트 게임으로서의 편의와 재미를 제대로 보여주는 게임이라고 생각됩니다.

명령 취소불가와 멍청한 AI의 조합이 여전히 거슬리긴 하지만 게임을 통해 얻는 재미가 더 크다고 느껴지기에 망설임 없이 추천합니다.

183562817.review: You make mistakes because there is no UI and NPC are dumbs, and mistakes make you lose hours because its impossible to comeback, really frustrating

183529808.review: 游戏还可以像素画风和宁静的背景音乐让人在和怪物大战后很放松,不过到后期流程就开始重复了
